name: The last of the Platoon
description:
You are a ww1 soldier with an order to complete.

While retreating from frontline trenches, one of our command officers forgot very imporatnt red folder full of crucial documents, that MUST NOT get into enemy hands!
Here is your order,  private : Get there and retrieve the documents immideatly.
Hurry, we plan to lay artillery barrages onto the positions soon, so keep moving!
Command relies upon you, private!

Dismissed!

PLEASE UNPLUG your VR before running, as it will break the game
Or, alternatively, launch it with -nohmd
I am streaming gamedevelopment as a fulltime streamer and rely upon your support, guys! So, consider heading to my Patreon page and helping a little, as i got fired from my irl job. Supporting me on Patreon will give you ability to influence games im developing, adding or removing things, too!

This is my second game i made all by myself, while learning Unreal Engine basics. I was streaming whole process on my Twitch, come to see how games being made, i stream 5-6 days per week!

This game is somewhat tied to the SCP universe . Project became reality with strong support from my patreons and friends, and you can support my future projects, too! This will also give you early access to test builds of game im currently making  and more :3 If you interested, you can check my Patreon page, that will be appreciated. I have discord server where i post gamedev updates and images, if you have any questions, you can join and chat.
